Install OpenSSL

Tina4 uses OpenSSL for security key generation.

Linux or MacOS Users

If you're on Linux or MacOS OpenSSL is installed by default.

Windows Users

Sadly you are going to need to do a bit more work.

Please download and install the SLProWeb OpenSSL Library. Use the Win64 OpenSSL v1.1.1k msi. Follow the default prompts.

Add the OpenSSL bin folder to the windows environment path so you can use it anywhere.
